title: China : weekly box office revenue November 2019 , by movie
yAxis: Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Hollywood Films, and Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Hollywood Films on the y axis.
Hollywood Films Frozen 2 has the highest Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars and Wings Over Everest has the lowest Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars.
The Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars of Hollywood Films Wings Over Everest is 24.87% smaller than the maximum value at Frozen 2.
